reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://qa4.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Content types' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Character Profile' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Manage fields' menu link.
Click the 'Character: First Name' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Character: First Name dialog'.
Enter '150' in the 'Soft length limit' text box.
Enter '10' in the 'Soft length minimum' text box.
Click the 'Save settings' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Character Profile dialog'.
Verify success message of 'Saved Character: First Name configuration.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Character Profile' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Character Profile dialog'.
Enter '599c' in the 'Character First Name' text box.
Verify the soft length under limit text of '4/150' is present.
Enter 'ce2dcb6a280945f' in the 'Character First Name' text box.
Verify the soft length meets limit text of '15/150' is present.

Enter '654e8c0c1d10480a9ddeb625b896fdf729573aadce77439a8419e4296b48f51c2cf0bc59ff0a4c399b7b4e3547881821071df21eb9e446ffbd0d40ec09117947e3645604e53142a0ae51a4a63097ebd5' in the 'Character First Name' text box.
Verify the soft length exceeds limit text of '160/150' is present.
Click the Cover Photo 'Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Assert the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Character Profile dialog'.
Click the 'Save' button.

Verify success message of 'Character Profile 654e8c0c1d10480a9ddeb625b896fdf729573aadce77439a8419e4296b48f51c2cf0bc59ff0a4c399b7b4e3547881821071df21eb9e446ffbd0d40ec09117947e3645604e53142a0ae51a4a63097ebd5 has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Content types' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Character Profile' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Manage fields' menu link.
Click the 'Character: First Name' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Character: First Name dialog'.
Enter '' in the 'Soft length limit' text box.
Enter '' in the 'Soft length minimum' text box.
Click the 'Save settings' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Character Profile dialog'.
Verify success message of 'Saved Character: First Name configuration.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Character Profile' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Character Profile dialog'.
Enter '599c' in the 'Character First Name' text box.
Verify the soft length under limit text of '4/150' is NOT present.
Enter 'ce2dcb6a280945f' in the 'Character First Name' text box.
Verify the soft length meets limit text of '15/150' is NOT present.
